name: Grenade
effect: Once per game, Targets point up to 1 stick from attacker, Blast AOE, 2d10 FP, +1 to Under Fire rolls

name: Jump Pack
effect: The weirdo can ignore terrain and other weirdos when taking Move actions

name: Medkit
effect: Once per game, 1 weirdo touching this weirdo becomes ready

name: Stealth Suit
effect: If this weirdo's base touches a piece of terrain, enemy weirdos do not have Line of Sight unless they are within 1 stick of the stealthy weirdo
